engine.entity
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  engine.entity.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnemyEntity, RelayEntity, StaticEntity
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract Entity class for GameWorld

dgattey

Entity

public Entity(CollisionShape shape,
              float width,
              float height,
              float density,
              float restitution,
              boolean isStatic,
              java.awt.Color c,
              GameWorld world)
Constructor for Entity with all fields (calculates mass automatically)

Parameters:
start - the start position
width - the width of the entity
height - the height of the entity
density - the given density of the entity (between 0 and 1)
restitution - restitution value of the entity (between 0 and 1)
isStatic - if the entity should be immovable
c - the color to give the entity
world - the world the entity appears in
